description:
The man Zolf brought in is called Zelgadis. He is a mixture of human, golem and demon; a creation of utter evil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crash! Gekitotsu! Akai no Shiroi no Ayashii no!
Crash! Red and White and Suspicious All Over!
Crash! 激突!赤いの白いの怪しいの!
Крах! Один — красный, другой — белый, и оба — подозрительные!
